summary: A romantic comedy, set on Cape Cod in 1905, about three 70-year-old retired sea captains who try to lure an attractive middle-aged woman into marriage.
cast: David Carradine|Rip Torn|Bruce Dern|Mariel Hemingway|Charles Durning|Jason Alan Smith|Christy Scott Cashman|Angelica Page|John Savage|Julie Harris|Stephen Russell|Stephen Mailer|Donald Foley|Miles Herter|Jonathan Edwards|Lila Dupree|Beverly Bentley|Evan Keene|Joshua Koopman|Ryan Stanger|Roger Dillingham Jr.|Joseph Guglielmo|Peter Jordan
title: The Golden Boys
